Egypt ⇔ hÉ 𒂍 Copt

Coptic Keyboard

The Coptic language is most important for the study of ancient Egyptian.
Černý's Coptic Etymological Dictionary

𐍅 Strange epsilon letter between Y,V,W,R,G! 𐌰𐌹𐍅=ever (𐍅:VR/WG:ⲩ) 𐌰𐌹𐍅=ewig in gothic

Coptic prefixes

à- ⲉ- to
er- ⲉ- to
